description.value: The classification or categorization of the resource. Works on multiple resources: * [MedicationDispense](http://hl7.org/fhir/medicationdispense.html): Return dispenses based on the value of category. * [MedicationAdministration](http://hl7.org/fhir/medicationadministration.html): Return administrations based on the value of category.

purpose.value: To select instances based the value of the `category` element for resources that do not have a SearchParameter defined by the base FHIR spec for this element.
